ProcessTemplates.Name: JSON to Zoho CRM - Customers
ProcessTemplates.Description: This template will read a local JSON file containing customer data and import the customers to Zoho CRM as contacts.
ProcessTemplates.ProcessVariablesJson: {"InFilePath":{"Value":"\"/path/customers.json\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"The full path to the JSON file that contains the customer data."},"ZohoApiUrl":{"Value":"\"https://www.zohoapis.eu\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"The regional API domain for Zoho CRM."},"ZohoAccountUrl":{"Value":"\"https://accounts.zoho.eu\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"The regional account domain for Zoho CRM."},"ZohoClientId":{"Value":"\"\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"The client ID for Zoho CRM."},"ZohoClientSecret":{"Value":"\"\"","IsSecret":true,"Mode":"text","Description":"The client secret for Zoho CRM."},"ZohoRefreshToken":{"Value":"\"\"","IsSecret":true,"Mode":"text","Description":"The Zoho refresh token, which is used to authorize access to Zoho CRM API."}}

Process.Name: JSON to Zoho CRM - Customers
Process.Description: This template will read a local JSON file containing customer data and import the customers to Zoho CRM as contacts.
